content.rendered:
Eyeing the constant changes in the ceiling fan industry and using our capabilities to design an Energy efficient solution, we designed our BLDC driver Cards for LV fan 1 phase & 3 phase motors in accordance to the Indian standards and requirements.

Our First batch of 10 thousand BLDC ceiling fan circuit board are already working in the field since the past 2 months as we supplied our maiden batch for evaluation. We have since then received inquiries and repeat orders from existing customers.We designed our first bldc ceiling fan circuit as a design service for a Delhi based Tier-2 customer,when EESL released its first tender and have constantly been perfecting the technology ever since.

Today, we have 3 variants of the BLDC ceiling fan control card
• Retrofit – Regulator Based Ceiling Fan Driver
• Comfort – IR Remote based Ceiling fan Driver
• Desire – IOT Enabled BLE/Wi-Fi controlled with Alexa and Google Home Integrated Fan circuit

excerpt.rendered:
• Low THD (< 5%)
  • High PF(>95%)

  • High Speed (380+ RPM) at Low Power
  • Custom shapes and fitment arrangements
